name: 小红·修身皮衣服饰包（附送29999灵币）
detailed_description:
Xiaohong Skin Garment Decoration Bag (with 29999 soul coins) DLC, including Xiaohong Character Garment "Skin Garment" permanent unlock, with the DLC gift of 29999 soul coins.
"Learn the Eight Matrix of Xichuan and hold the military symbol in the Mandarin duck's sleeve." A set of self-cultivating leather clothes, highlighting the cool and graceful posture of female spiritual detectives, regardless of investigation or daily life, can make it handsome and compelling.
Style:
Top: Brown Leather
Pants: Black leather pants
Shoes: Camouflage boots
Other:
